resources.string:
Welcome to the latest and greatest Saucillator. Some changes have been made:
 
 Create & Edit Instruments!
 -You can now create your own instruments and save them for later use. An instrument is comprised of a timbre (how it sounds) and effects on that timbre.
 
 New Effects!
 -There is now an EQ effect that runs on top of ALL playing sounds. It is not specific to the current instrument. There are also new instrument effects available: envelope (attack, decay) and delay decay. The other effects have been polished up nicely.
 
 Two Pad Modes!
 -There are two ways to use the pad: to Edit an instrument or to Play multiple instruments. The Edit Pad is default. In this mode, you can assign FX to the pad and manipulate them with your finger. In the Play mode, each finger creates a new version of the current instrument. Save your instruments and edit the timbre from the menu.
 
 Happy Saucing! Bug fixes, improvements, and upgrades to come sooner than this one did.
